verses.verse: In the third<WH7969> year<WH8141> of the reign<WH4438> of king<WH4428> Belshazzar<WH1112> a vision<WH2377> appeared<WH7200> to me,<WH1840> even to me, Daniel, after<WH310> that which appeared<WH7200> to me at the first.<WH8462>

I saw<WH7200> in the vision;<WH2377> now it was so,<WH7200> that when I saw, I was in the citadel<WH1002> of Susa,<WH7800> which is in the province<WH4082> of Elam;<WH5867> and I saw<WH7200> in the vision,<WH2377> and I was by the river<WH180> Ulai.<WH195>

Then I lifted up<WH5375> my eyes,<WH5869> and saw,<WH7200> and behold,<WH5975> there stood before<WH6440> the river<WH180> a<WH259> ram<WH352> which had two horns:<WH7161> and the two horns<WH7161> were high;<WH1364> but one<WH259> was higher<WH1364> than the other,<WH8145> and the higher<WH1364> came up<WH5927> last.<WH314>

I saw<WH7200> the ram<WH352> pushing<WH5055> westward,<WH3220> and northward,<WH6828> and southward;<WH5045> and no animals<WH2416> could stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> him,<WH5337> neither was there any who could deliver out of his hand;<WH3027> but he did<WH6213> according to his will,<WH7522> and magnified himself.<WH1431>

As I was considering,<WH995> behold,<WH5795> a male goat<WH6842> came<WH935> from the west<WH4628> over the surface<WH6440> of the whole earth,<WH776> and didn't<WH5060> touch the ground:<WH776> and the goat<WH6842> had a notable<WH2380> horn<WH7161> between his eyes.<WH5869>

He came<WH935> to the ram<WH352> that had<WH1167> the two horns,<WH7161> which I saw<WH7200> standing<WH5975> before<WH6440> the river,<WH180> and ran<WH7323> on him in the fury<WH2534> of his power.<WH3581>

I saw<WH7200> him come<WH5060> close to<WH681> the ram,<WH352> and he was moved with anger<WH4843> against him,<WH5221> and struck the ram,<WH352> and broke<WH7665> his two<WH8147> horns;<WH7161> and there was no power<WH3581> in the ram<WH352> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> him;<WH7993> but he cast him down to the ground,<WH776> and trampled<WH7429> on him;<WH5337> and there was none who could deliver the ram<WH352> out of his hand.<WH3027>

The male<WH6842> goat<WH5795> magnified<WH1431> himself exceedingly:<WH3966> and when he<WH6842> was strong,<WH6105> the great<WH1431> horn<WH7161> was broken;<WH7665> and instead of it there came up<WH5927> four<WH702> notable horns toward the four<WH702> winds<WH7307> of the sky.<WH8064>

Out of one<WH259> of them came forth<WH3318> a little<WH4704> horn,<WH7161> which grew exceeding<WH3499> great,<WH1431> toward the south,<WH5045> and toward the east,<WH4217> and toward the glorious land.<WH6643>
It grew great,<WH1431> even to the army<WH6635> of the sky;<WH8064> and some of the army<WH6635> and of the stars<WH3556> it cast down<WH5307> to the ground,<WH776> and trampled on them.<WH7429>

Yes,<WH1431> it magnified itself,<WH8269> even to the prince of the army;<WH6635> and it took away<WH7311> from him the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH4349> and the place of his sanctuary<WH4720> was cast down.<WH7993>

The army<WH6635> was given<WH5414> over to it together with the continual<WH8548> burnt offering through disobedience;<WH6588> and it cast down<WH7993> truth<WH571> to the ground,<WH776> and it did its pleasure<WH6213> and prospered.<WH6743>

Then I heard<WH8085> a<WH259> holy one<WH6918> speaking;<WH1696> and another<WH259> holy one<WH259> said<WH559> to that certain<WH6422> one who spoke,<WH1696> How long shall be the vision<WH2377> concerning the continual<WH8548> burnt offering,<WH6588> and the disobedience that makes desolate,<WH8074> to give<WH5414> both the sanctuary<WH6944> and the army<WH6635> to be trodden under foot?<WH4823>
He said<WH559> to me,<WH505> To two thousand and three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> evenings<WH6153> and mornings;<WH6944> then shall the sanctuary be cleansed.<WH6663>

It happened,<WH1840> when I, even I Daniel, had seen<WH7200> the vision,<WH2377> that I sought<WH1245> to understand<WH998> it;<WH5975> and behold, there stood before me as the appearance<WH4758> of a man.<WH1397>

I heard<WH8085> a man<WH120>'s voice<WH6963> between the banks of the Ulai,<WH195> which called,<WH7121> and said,<WH559> Gabriel,<WH1403> make this<WH1975> man to understand<WH995> the vision.<WH4758>

So he came<WH935> near<WH681> where I stood;<WH5977> and when he came,<WH935> I was frightened,<WH1204> and fell<WH5307> on my face:<WH6440> but he said<WH559> to me,<WH995> Understand, son<WH1121> of man;<WH120> for the vision<WH2377> belongs to the time<WH6256> of the end.<WH7093>
Now as he was speaking<WH1696> with me,<WH7290> I fell into a deep sleep with my face<WH6440> toward the ground;<WH776> but he touched<WH5060> me,<WH5975> and set me upright.<WH5977>
He said,<WH559> Behold,<WH3045> I will make you know what shall be in the latter time<WH319> of the indignation;<WH2195> for it belongs to the appointed<WH4150> time of the end.<WH7093>
The ram<WH352> which you saw,<WH7200> that had<WH1167> the two horns,<WH7161> they are the kings<WH4428> of Media<WH4074> and Persia.<WH6539>
The rough<WH8163> male goat<WH6842> is the king<WH4428> of Greece:<WH3120> and the great<WH1419> horn<WH7161> that is between his eyes<WH5869> is the first<WH7223> king.<WH4428>
As for that which was broken,<WH7665> in the place where four<WH702> stood up,<WH5975> four<WH702> kingdoms<WH4438> shall stand up<WH5975> out of the nation,<WH1471> but not with his power.<WH3581>

In the latter time<WH319> of their kingdom,<WH4438> when the transgressors<WH6586> have come to the full,<WH8552> a king<WH4428> of fierce<WH5794> face,<WH6440> and understanding<WH995> dark sentences,<WH2420> shall stand up.<WH5975>

His power<WH3581> shall be mighty,<WH6105> but not by his own power;<WH3581> and he shall destroy<WH7843> wonderfully,<WH6381> and shall prosper<WH6743> and do his pleasure;<WH6213> and he shall destroy<WH7843> the mighty<WH6099> ones and the holy<WH6918> people.<WH5971>

Through his policy<WH7922> he shall cause craft<WH4820> to prosper<WH6743> in his hand;<WH3027> and he shall magnify<WH1431> himself in his heart,<WH3824> and in their security<WH7962> shall he destroy<WH7843> many:<WH7227> he shall also stand up<WH5975> against the prince<WH8269> of princes;<WH8269> but he shall be broken<WH7665> without<WH657> hand.<WH3027>
The vision<WH4758> of the evenings<WH6153> and mornings<WH1242> which has been told<WH559> is true:<WH571> but seal up<WH5640> the vision;<WH2377> for it belongs to many<WH7227> days to come.<WH3117>

I,<WH1840> Daniel, fainted,<WH1961> and was sick<WH2470> certain days;<WH3117> then I rose up,<WH6965> and did<WH6213> the king<WH4428>'s business:<WH4399> and I wondered<WH8074> at the vision,<WH4758> but none understood it.<WH995>
